name: Ad Astra (jordanfb)
description:
Controls:
Keyboard and mouse:

WASD - fly around

Left click - fire primary weapon

Right click - fire secondary weapon

Scroll - zoom in and out

M - Minimap shortcut -- double press it is a shortcut to the universe map, or you can scroll even further out

Escape - Pause game

Controller:

Left stick - fly around

Right stick - aim

Left bumpers - fire primary weapon

Right bumpers - fire secondary weapon

DPad - zoom in and out

Back button - Map -- double press it is a shortcut to the universe map, or you can zoom even further out

Start button - Pause game
